Summary: Silver with some glowing lights of blue and violet out one side. The other one was white.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting at the Bluewater Bridge custom's lineup. I was going to work in Port Huron from my home in Sarnia at 0830 on Monday, April 2, 2012. I caught a glimpse of an object off the corner of the customs building which was hovering. It was silver and gave off a couple of coloured lights from one side. I tried to find my phone to take a picture and when I looked back up, there were 2. The other one seemed either smaller or farther away and was a white orb. I had to go through customs and when I came out, they were gone. I never saw them leave. They were just gone. I was so excited, I couldn't wait to tell people.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Port Huron
There were no other sightings in Port Huron on or around April 2nd 2012
